column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police and immigration officials visited House 35C
column7: and arrested 9 Chinese nationals without passports on the morning June 21
column8: 2019.------A total of 43 Chinese (including 8 women) were questioned and had documents examined. A total of 8 Chinese nationals (3 women) were detained after they were found to be in Cambodia without passports. ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/86563
